BasicInfo.short: Foundersuite is a collection of software tools and templates that help startup CEOs execute more efficiently and effectively.

Products.name: Progress Tracker
Products.description: A visual log of milestones, progress points and key data used to update investors or advisors.

news.title: San Francisco based Foundersuite brings order to startup chaos

Products.name: Investor CRM
Products.description: A visual CRM tool to manage a startup's investor pipeline, built on AngelList and LinkedIn APIs.

news.title: San Francisco based Foundersuite brings order to startup chaos

Products.name: Media CRM
Products.description: A visual CRM tool for tracking PR pitches and managing media relationships.

Products.name: Idea Validation
Products.description: A tool to synthesize ideas for new products or services, and to get structured feedback from your network.

news.title: San Francisco based Foundersuite brings order to startup chaos
[YS Lounge] Why founders are mostly irrational

Products.name: Company Tracker
Products.description: A dashboard to monitor news, blogs, tweets, fundings, hirings, traffic on competitors, partners or customers.
